body: Hi friends . Can i analysis energy in topological(Non-linear forms) form in ladybug and honebee?
topic: analysis energy in topological(Non-linear forms) form

replies.body:
Both Honeybee and Ladybug can handle non-planar geometries. Watch this video as an example.

<iframe _origwidth="560" frameborder="0" height="267" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/t0mgsZF7Dno?wmode=opaque" width="475"></iframe>

And follow this videos for instructions to make sure that you are putting in the geometry correctly and understanding what is being run:

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nMQ2Pau4q6c&list=PLruLh1AdY-SgW...](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nMQ2Pau4q6c&list=PLruLh1AdY-SgW4uDtNSMLeiUmA8YXEHT_&index=12)



-Chris
